readingKunHtml: おぼ, しず, ない
sourceMeaningMnemonic: If you figure out how to use a <radical>tsunami</radical> as a <radical>weapon</radical>, everyone is going to <kanji>die</kanji>. You can't control a tsunami, you fool. Now you've doomed us all.
meaningInfo: Picture everyone in the world being swept away in a tsunami to die. This is what happens when you try to use nature as a weapon.
readingMnemonic: The only way to maybe not <kanji>die</kanji> is to find <reading>boats</reading> (<ja>ぼつ</ja>). As long as the boats don't get smashed by the tsunami, you might be able to cheat death by holding onto the boats and not drowning.
readingInfo: You don't want to die, do you? Get to the boats!
